column5: NWL OK someone is definitely liquidating a position here These 3 days make no sense Lets hope its not Icahn That being said Carl owns about 40M shares so even if he tried to sell 23M shares a day probably more than the market could absorb hed be selling for 1520 days and would take a 400M loss Ugh What a bad stock and ugly chart
NWL I guess therell be no bounce whatsoever
NWL couldnt help myself Added 100 at 1344

NWL wonder if enough people reinvest divy it will push stock up a little believe it or not the 97M dividend payout can buy 72 million shares which is more than a days volume in buy orders will see in a couple weeks
